title: 524.5-415 BOND.
text: The court may require a conservator to furnish a bond conditioned upon faithful discharge of all duties of the conservatorship according to law, with sureties as it may specify. A bond is not required for any conservator that is a bank or trust company provided the total conservatorship assets do not exceed $1,000,000. If the conservator is a bank or trust company then a bond shall be required if the conservatorship assets exceed $1,000,000.
